sentences.en: A few decades ago a statement like this would have seemed unimaginable.
sentences.cn: 十年以前,这样的陈述是无法想象的.

sentences.en: Because , because are children who are living in unimaginable poverty.
sentences.cn: 因为这些孩子生活的环境贫穷无法想象.

sentences.en: Beyond , above , below, were other swarms of workers engaged in an unimaginable multitude of jobs.
sentences.cn: 楼上楼下,身前身后, 还有嗡嗡营营的一大群人,他们的工作五花八门,叫你想也想不出来.

sentences.en: For most younger readers, it will seem all but unimaginable.
sentences.cn: 而大部分年轻读者读此书, 定会觉得一切都是那样难以想象.

sentences.en: If it goes on like that, the consequence is unimaginable.
sentences.cn: 事情若再发展, 后果将不堪设想.

sentences.en: Instead, Assiya summoned the unimaginable courage to go public and fight back.
sentences.cn: 然而, 阿西娅积聚起超乎想象的勇气面对公众并反击.

sentences.en: It is unimaginable that he is an unhonest man.
sentences.cn: 他竟然是个不诚实的人是不可思议的.

sentences.en: It would have resulted in an unimaginable hunger catastrophe.
sentences.cn: 这势必要造成不可想象的饥荒.

sentences.en: John raved against his closest friends, accusing them of unimaginable crimes.
sentences.cn: 约翰痛骂他的密友们, 指责他们犯了难以想象的罪行.

sentences.en: Once these privacy information are divulged, consequence is unimaginable.
sentences.cn: 这些隐私信息一旦泄露, 后果不堪设想.

sentences.en: Such speed of travel was unimaginable before the railway age.
sentences.cn: 这样的车速在铁路时代之前是不可想像的.

sentences.en: The children here have lived through unimaginable horrors.
sentences.cn: 这里的孩子经历了难以想象的恐惧。

sentences.en: The scale of the fighting is almost unimaginable.
sentences.cn: 战斗的规模几乎无法想象。

sentences.en: We all believed it unimaginable that he had lived alone on a deserted island for so long.
sentences.cn: 我们都觉得他在渺无人迹的荒岛上住这么久是不可想象的.

sentences.en: When we are in buoyant health , death is all but unimaginable.
sentences.cn: 我们身强力壮时根本想不到死.

words.tran_cn: 不可思议的；难以想像的

trans.tran_cn: 难以想象的，想不到的，不能想像
